anidesignit-portfolio.name: AniDesignIt Portfolio
anidesignit-portfolio.subtitle: My personal portfolio showcasing creative web design and UX case studies.
anidesignit-portfolio.summary: Dynamic portfolio website built with Astro, Strapi CMS, and Tailwind.
anidesignit-portfolio.body:
The Challenge

I wanted a portfolio that reflected both my technical and artistic side — dynamic, scrollable, and easy to update through a CMS.

The Solution

I built it from scratch using Astro + Firebase for dynamic content, with smooth Lottie animations and a horizontal scroll layout.

Results & Impact

The result was a fast, visually engaging website that streamlined my case study workflow and improved SEO performance.

Testimonial

“This project represents my journey as a designer — where code meets creativity.”

zolu-ai-assistant.name: Zolu – AI Assistant for ADHD
zolu-ai-assistant.subtitle: An AI-powered personal assistant that helps ADHD users organize their lives.
zolu-ai-assistant.summary: App design and prototype created with empathy and AI to support focus and time management.
zolu-ai-assistant.body:
The Challenge

People with ADHD often struggle with time management and focus. The goal was to design a calm, conversational assistant to help.

The Solution

I designed an interface with mood tracking, Pomodoro timers, and a soft voice AI experience using ElevenLabs.

Results & Impact

The prototype established a strong emotional connection through tone and UX consistency. The MVP is now ready for developer handoff.

Testimonial

“Zolu feels like a friend that listens — not just another productivity app.”

louise-lee-website.name: Louise Lee Website
louise-lee-website.subtitle: An elegant website for a life and leadership coach in Vancouver.
louise-lee-website.summary: 12-page website redesign with soft typography and earthy tones to reflect Louise’s coaching style.
louise-lee-website.body:
The Challenge

Louise’s old website lacked visual clarity and didn’t convey her warmth.

The Solution

I redesigned the site using calm colors and elegant layouts to inspire confidence and trust.

Results & Impact

Bookings increased and her clients reported a stronger sense of connection with her brand.

Testimonial

“Ana captured my voice and message beautifully — my new site finally feels like me.” – Louise Lee

ghg-accounting-website.name: GHG Accounting Website
ghg-accounting-website.subtitle: Corporate website redesign for a sustainability consulting firm.
ghg-accounting-website.summary: Website with Lottie animations, multi-language support, and modern structure.
ghg-accounting-website.body:
The Challenge

GHG needed a professional yet innovative website to reflect their environmental mission.

The Solution

I built it in Webflow using green tones, structured layouts, and interactive animations.

Results & Impact

The site boosted SEO rankings and helped attract international partners through clearer storytelling.

Testimonial

“Ana brought clarity and creativity to a complex industry — the result speaks for itself.”

marquess-coffee.name: Marquess Coffee
marquess-coffee.subtitle: Branding and e-commerce for a premium coffee brand.
marquess-coffee.summary: Complete branding and Webflow e-commerce setup with Ecwid integration.
marquess-coffee.body:
The Challenge

Marquess needed a strong brand and online store to showcase Brazilian coffee products.

The Solution

I created their brand identity, packaging design, and developed an e-commerce website on Webflow.

Results & Impact

The cohesive brand boosted early customer trust and online engagement.

Testimonial

“Ana turned my vision into a brand I’m proud of — everything feels authentic.” – Gabby Oliveira

daniel-pinto-portfolio.name: Daniel Pinto Portfolio
daniel-pinto-portfolio.subtitle: Minimal portfolio for a multidisciplinary artist.
daniel-pinto-portfolio.summary: Clean and fast website showcasing Daniel’s art and photography.
daniel-pinto-portfolio.body:
The Challenge

Daniel needed a modern portfolio that focused on his art without distractions.

The Solution

I designed a fullscreen gallery layout with smooth transitions and easy navigation.

Results & Impact

The new site improved engagement and delivered fast load times with optimized visuals.

Testimonial

“Ana delivered exactly what I envisioned — clean, impactful, and modern.” – Daniel Pinto
